Constructor Detail

SearchDialog

public SearchDialog(KafenioPanel parent,
                    java.lang.String title,
                    boolean bModal,
                    boolean bIsReplace,
                    boolean bCaseSetting,
                    boolean bTopSetting,
                    java.lang.String findText,
                    java.lang.String replaceText)
creates a new SearchDialog using the given values.

Parameters:
parent - parent frame
title - frame title
bModal - boolean value
bIsReplace - is replace turned on by default?
bCaseSetting - true for case sensitive search, false for case insensitive.
bTopSetting - wrap mode on?
findText - the text to find
replaceText - the text to replace the found text with
